Package commandLineApplication

Class Item

java.lang.Object
commandLineApplication.Item
public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
Items that are available to buy or sell by the player from/to a store when visiting the island
Items includes food and weapons
Author:
Aerinn Nguyen, Bede Skinner-Vennell

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String type, int size, int price)
      Constructor for an item
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item
      description - The description of the item
      type - The type of the item, either Food or Weapon
      size - the capacity the item takes
      price - the original price of the item

    • sellItem

      public void sellItem​(Island location, int price)
      Player wants to increase coins or get rid of an item by selling it to a store that will buy it
      Parameters:
      location - The island where the store is based
      price - The price which the item was sold for by the player

    • getPurchasedPrice

      public int getPurchasedPrice()
      Get the price that a player has to pay to buy an item
      Returns:
      item's purchased price

    • getSoldPrice

      public int getSoldPrice()
      Get the price that a player will sell an item to a store, which is smaller than the purchased price
      Returns:
      item's sold price

    • buyItem

      public void buyItem​(int price)
      Player wants to buy an item from a store
      Parameters:
      price - The price that the item costs the player to buy the item

    • getIslandSoldOn

      public Island getIslandSoldOn()
      Get the island where the item is sold from
      Returns:
      island

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Item item)
      Identify if the 2 items are identical or not
      Parameters:
      item - The other item that needs to be compared with
      Returns:
      true (if they are identical) or false (if they are different)
